alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Crawford County through 445 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atlantic, or 9 miles southwest of Meadville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Adamsville, Guys Mills, Atlantic, Saegertown, Conneaut Lake, Blooming Valley, Townville, Venango, Woodcock, Conneaut Lakeshore, Geneva and Hartstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
